int    buttonColor = vga_back.color_border
) 
 

<int> x1, y1 = upper left corner of the radio button <int> x2, y2 = lower right corner of the radio button <int> optionNum = number of options <int*> selNum = ptr to selection number <char**> optionDesc = description of the options [int] buttonColor = color of buttons (default = vga_back.color_border)
